predictions.text: At its early-November 2025 meeting, the FOMC will lower the federal funds target range by at least 25 basis points.
predictions.verification_criteria: Federal Reserve press release and Implementation Note dated during the November 2025 FOMC meeting show the target range decreased by ≥25 bps versus the prior target range.
predictions.rationale: Growth is cooling and policymakers are signaling openness to easing; inflation progress allows a starter cut.

predictions.text: From 2025-09-23 close to 2025-10-31 close, Apple (AAPL) will outperform the S&P 500 Index (^GSPC) by at least 3.0 percentage points based on percentage change in adjusted close prices.
predictions.verification_criteria: Using Yahoo Finance adjusted closes for AAPL and ^GSPC, compute % change from 2025-09-23 to 2025-10-31; AAPL minus ^GSPC ≥ 3.0 percentage points.
monitoring_signals: Treasury yields and mega-cap factor leadership
predictions.rationale: Strong product cycle momentum and mega-cap leadership should support relative outperformance.

predictions.text: The LBMA Gold Price PM will fix at or above $3,800 per troy ounce on at least one trading day by 2025-11-30.
predictions.verification_criteria: LBMA Gold Price PM benchmark (ICE/Refinitiv) shows any PM fix ≥ $3,800 before the deadline.
predictions.rationale: Record-high momentum, easing-rate expectations, and haven demand could extend the rally to new highs.

predictions.text: By 2025-10-31, the European Commission will open a formal DMA non-compliance proceeding or issue a Statement of Objections against at least one designated gatekeeper.
predictions.verification_criteria: An official European Commission press release or public case file citing the Digital Markets Act announces opening of proceedings or a Statement of Objections before the deadline.
monitoring_signals: EC press releases and case registers
predictions.rationale: The EC is escalating enforcement; multiple gatekeepers face unresolved compliance gaps.

predictions.text: By 2025-10-31, Ørsted will publicly announce the resumption of construction or offshore installation activities for the Revolution Wind project.
predictions.verification_criteria: An Ørsted press release or official project communication dated after 2025-09-22 explicitly states that construction or offshore installation for Revolution Wind has resumed.
predictions.rationale: A court decision removing the halt enables a prompt restart to protect schedule and credits.

predictions.text: By 2025-10-31, at least three additional UN member states will formally recognize the State of Palestine after 2025-09-22.
predictions.verification_criteria: Official government statements or foreign ministry communiqués dated after 2025-09-22 explicitly recognizing the State of Palestine; reputable international outlets summarizing recognitions are acceptable corroboration.
monitoring_signals: EU and Latin American government statements
predictions.rationale: UN momentum raises diplomatic pressure and lowers barriers for additional recognitions.

predictions.text: By 2025-11-30, India will approve at least two new semiconductor fab or advanced packaging projects under the India Semiconductor Mission with combined central incentives of $6B or more.
predictions.verification_criteria: Press Information Bureau or MeitY announcements or cabinet approvals list projects and incentive amounts totaling ≥ $6B (USD-equivalent) across at least two distinct approvals.
predictions.rationale: India signaled large funding; tangible approvals are likely to follow to anchor investment.

predictions.text: The EIA 4-week average 'product supplied of finished motor gasoline' will fall to at or below 8.50 million barrels per day in at least one weekly report released by 2025-11-15.
predictions.verification_criteria: EIA Weekly Petroleum Status Report shows the 4-week average of finished motor gasoline product supplied ≤ 8.50 mb/d in any release through the deadline.
predictions.rationale: Shoulder-season patterns, high prices, and softer demand likely pull gasoline consumption lower.

predictions.text: ISM Services PMI for October 2025 will print between 50.0 and 52.5 in the release due by 2025-11-05.
predictions.verification_criteria: ISM’s official October 2025 Services PMI headline index is within [50.0, 52.5], per the Institute for Supply Management release.
predictions.rationale: Services growth should cool yet stay modestly expansionary amid slower hiring.

predictions.text: The MBA Weekly Survey 30-year fixed mortgage rate (conforming) will print at or below 6.25% in at least one report released by 2025-11-30.
predictions.verification_criteria: MBA weekly survey shows the average contract rate for 30-year fixed-rate mortgages (conforming loan balances) ≤ 6.25% in any release before the deadline.
predictions.rationale: Falling Treasury yields and easing inflation should pull mortgage rates lower.

predictions.text: The ICE U.S. Dollar Index (DXY) will close at or below 101.00 on at least one trading day by 2025-11-30 (UTC).
predictions.verification_criteria: End-of-day close for DXY (ICE index or Yahoo Finance ^DXY) ≤ 101.00 on any date by the deadline.
monitoring_signals: Energy prices and terms of trade
predictions.rationale: An easing-rate outlook and improving ex-US growth can pressure the dollar.

predictions.text: Seasonally adjusted U.S. insured unemployment (continuing claims) will reach at or above 1.90 million in at least one weekly report released by 2025-10-31.
predictions.verification_criteria: Department of Labor unemployment insurance weekly claims release shows Insured Unemployment (SA) ≥ 1.90 million in any report before the deadline.
predictions.rationale: Cooling labor demand should gradually lift continuing claims.
